commenter_a: Once they hit 65 it should be mandatory yearly testing until age 75 in which case it needs to be testing every 6 months. Elderly people do not belong on the road. NOW before you idiots talk crap let me just tell you my father drove until he was 87 years old. When my brother and I reported him to the DMV at 83 years of age he was sly. He just went and took his drive test at the Silverton branch of the DMV and passed because all they had him do was drive around the block. Regardless, old people need to be allowed to ride the buss and max for free and stay out from behind the wheel!!.
